mapper.select: select ta.class_nm_s, ta.class_notice_title, ta.mid, ta.class_hw_no, ta.class_hw_file, ta.class_notice_date, ta.class_notice_content from ( SELECT c.class_nm_s, c.TUTOR_ID as mid, h.class_hw_no,h.class_hw_file,n.class_notice_no,n.class_notice_title,n.class_notice_date,n.class_notice_content FROM class c, class_notice n, class_hw h where c.class_no = n.class_no and n.class_notice_no = h.class_hw_no) ta where ta.class_notice_no=#{class_notice_no}

select ta.class_nm_s, ta.class_notice_title, ta.mid, ta.class_hw_no, ta.class_hw_file, ta.class_notice_date, ta.class_notice_content from ( SELECT c.class_nm_s, c.TUTOR_ID as mid, h.class_hw_no,h.class_hw_file,n.class_notice_no,n.class_notice_title,n.class_notice_date,n.class_notice_content FROM class c, class_notice n, class_hw h where c.class_no = n.class_no and n.class_notice_no = h.class_hw_no) ta where ta.class_notice_no=#{class_notice_no}
mapper.update: update CLASS_NOTICE set CLASS_NOTICE_TITLE=#{class_notice_title}, CLASS_NOTICE_CONTENT=#{class_notice_content} where class_notice_no =#{class_notice_no}
